To all my friends: I know it was really shitty of me to write that I thought you were only friends with me out of pity, I know you aren't. I know you're friends with me for a good and positive reason... however, I can't for the life of me think what that reason may be... I feel like a really worthless human right now. I also know that this may upset some of you, and I'm sorry. I don't know why I get this way. I feel empty inside, like a shell of what and who I once was. A darkness fills my void. I do not know why I have reverted to this self torture. I feel as though I am an uncaring and worthless person. I can't imagine why anyone remains around me. I should be put in a hole and starved, with nothing but a razor to punish myself and feed off my own blood. I am continuously consumed by a black apathy that nags at me each time I begin to enjoy life again. Sorry to instill doubt within all the readers, but, how realistic is that? Honestly... look at the pattern (mine at least): more often than not when I look forward to, say, an event it somehow falls through. When I say to myself, "I am going to have a good day," It is often far from good. Maybe I set my expectations too high.... I do not know. All I know is I had a good afternoon, I talked to friends on the phone. I enjoyed talking to friends on the phone. I had the idea that I had grown away from them, it is worry. I fear that I am not the person I was when I left them. I analyzed my feelings and that has to be what is my latest difficulty. Writing is the only action that makes me feel any better, at all.

Okay, feeling better I am. I am incredibly critical of myself, and it shows. A LOT! Brrr but I'm feelin better! Fuck you it all goes away. Hehe SOAD man. I spent like 3 hours talking to two of my bestest friendses. Put me in a fabulous mood. I cannot wait to get back to Reno! FRIENDS!! KUNG FU!!! EXERCISE!! and of course, sex. Heh, I do not want as much sex as I think I want. I want orgasms. I want to give and recieve, however, not by sex other than oral. Thag you very buch. urlLink You Should Be On Temptation Island! You probably think I'm making too big of a deal about this, but I have high standards when it comes to certain things, and pardon me if thinking that knowing how to spell what your fucking project is about is important. Not only am I socially retarded but I am an imbicile as well. Who FUCKING makes a mistake like that? WHO?! God, I'm such an ass... no wonder I have no friends here. Everyone in reno: it's pity friendship, isn't it? I need to go take a shower with my razor. Fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck I am so dumb.

I have had an excellent evening! Dinner with my mother, Grandfather, and his friend Linda. Food was incredible!! Halibut... An eggplant and mushroom puree soup, my god, who comes up with this shit?! And the desert... pastry puff with ice cream and a chocolate sauce with liquor... I cannot describe the taste! It was glorious! Fucking ORGASMIC! I went from being in a fairly shit mood to being happy again. An my Grandfather has proven to me that he is not an asshole...I don't want him to die!! Hooray! Joyus be all! Haha live is good for the time being. Went from wanting to slit my wrists before the meal to wanting to love life. What food can do. Meanwhile, an online friend has just told me he's a neo-nazi. With a "hehe" this poor boy is proud. He hates "niggers and chinks" why? Because he doesn't understand their culture. People, this is what causes events such as the HOLOCAUST. The blatant decision to be an ignoramus, I feel the time to post my essay "Ignorance is Fatal" oh, and kiddies, try making a decision for yourself every now and then. White Pride? What the fuck is that? Seriously? I'm not proud to be white...who the fuck thinks it's a good thing? The color of one's skin determines nothing relating to brain size or capacity or ability. We are in no way superior to people with a different skin and culture... It is bullshit and I am constantly astounded as to how people get drawn into such nonsense. And now, The Essay: Ignorance “Ignorance is fatal,” a conclusion expressed by a character, in The Martian Chronicles by Ray Bradbury, who was desperate to have the world remember that which it had destroyed. Anything that came from the human imagination was made illegal and forgotten. For those who knew of the wonders lost, it was a horror to watch the new generations grow and have no idea of creative possibilities. One man makes a last attempt to show the people who took the fantasy away what they had in fact taken. He creates a situation that he had read about in an “illegal” book and victimizes certain people. He tells one that had he read the book he would know what would happen to him. A world where only “pure” factual material is published and any imaginative product is outlawed is, well, unimaginable. The question, “How is restriction of imagination enforced” comes to mind. Books not relating to solid facts were burned. What of the people who are the source of the unbelievable? Are children merely discouraged and punished for suggesting the presence of an invisible friend or the wish to fly like a bird? Scientific facts must be etched in the minds of the young early on. Then there would be little chance of objection, the children would not know anything different. The teaching of the young is an old trick, so to speak, used many a time in the past. An example of such teaching is religion. How many people truly question the faith they have grown up with? When one is subjected to years of “truth” it cannot be questioned. Were it to be, all of life would seem unreal to that person. “What is truth?” would rise in their minds. The boundaries set by certain persons has now been breached. If a mind questions, how can it be controlled? It is assumed that without imagination many would not be able to think creatively and therefore would need others to think for them. Control. Some question truth without having faith. In society it is very difficult to decide what is “right”. The beginning to such query may begin with thoughts like, “Maybe it is not weight I should worry about, but appearance,” or “Perhaps caloric intake is not what needs to be watched, but the fat and sugar content,” the steps to open the mind tend to begin with seeming insignificancies. To question one idea will inevitably lead to questioning another. Society’s ideals may eventually seem ridiculous to someone who began wondering about media’s pressures. Wonder is an opening to learning, and learning is the path to knowledge. Learning is a strange action. In some ways learning is beyond the control of the learner. Personal learning such as touching a hot plate and getting burned is a fact of life and cannot be changed. If someone is being taught a fact they are learning what has been learned by another, and the interpretation may not be what the learner would interpret. Therefore, when being taught, a person may not learn what was intended to be learned. Ignorance is also very complex. To one person ignorance may be a lack of common sense, to another a lack of knowledge. It is most likely both. Whether ignorance is fatal depends on the situation in which one needs not to be ignorant. Red Chii urlLink Chobits - What Color Chii Are You? Dryad urlLink What magical female creature are you?

Oy vey, no food or money today. At school, lunchtime, no lunch, very sad, very hungry. ::Sob:: I guess I should not have put all that money in that drawer just to hoard it from my mum. Heh, karma, man, it's been kicking my ass all month. I reeeeeaally hope Dcik gets my yearbook today. I want it signed by as mnay people as possible so I can have a false sense of popularity. Weak me. Ah well. I cannot wait to return to Reno and see everyone again. Yay!! I'm going to get so bored this summer. I bet I'll wear out every one of my plans within a week or two. At least there will be the fitness goal to continuously work toward. KUNG FUCKING FU BABY!!! Lol tis my little thoughts that make me seem weird and idiotic. Life shall continue when I return to my love. I have figured things out... Kung Fu=my life, I will not have not done Kung Fu for 6 monthes when I go back to it, therefore I have lost 6 monthes of my life. Grr. The experience living here has been a complex formula of hate, depression, intigue, and sorrow. Note: 1/4 of the mix is positive. I conclude that this past time has not been worth it. I choose not to sulk, by gum. I shall take what I have learned here to expand my sense of being. I have learned something about myself. Many things actually. I cannot survive without my friends or Kung Fu. Whether I can survive with one and not the other has yet to be determined. I also learned that I fear people if I have no one to go to. In other words I need at least one good friend to turn to when the rest of the world hates me. Lastly, I need to stay fit. I get depressed when I am not sleek and energetic like I used to be. My plan: Return to Reno-get GF to buy me a membership to 24 hour fitness-make nice with the body builders so they help me become one (Females who body build without steroids DO NOT end up looking like men...got that?!? What knowledge can do...uninformed assholes...) then I can be all "I are Superwoman!! Don't fuck with me unless I say so!" Hehe...Me and my crazy ideas.

I should put it on here, but I do not feel like it right now. I am tired and it's early. Too early. Too fucking early to do anything more than type or stare blankly into my bowl of cereal. I will later today maybe...

Okay, very good night. What a little social activity can do for your well-being. Selling doughnuts for Key Club...I'm not in dat Club. I volunteered to be in key club...isn't that funny? Ah, spoke to some people at the Future Farmers of America fair. Yeah buddy. Heh heh, oh I wish I could socialize at school, I would have friends. Friends!! ...here. It is so lonely being me. ...here. There are people I want to get to know, but I only have 2 weeks left. E-mails!! Sad now. I was so happy. I spent like 5 fucking hours at this place...okay 4, but still. My headaches are getting progressively worse. Ow. I feel like my head is being squeezed, like a grape. Ow. Lol, for those hours I was with a teacher. A teacher who is 25 and pretty fucking cool. I love it when teachers are nice and easy to talk to. Nice. I saw the funny boy that I like at the fair. THE ATTRACTION RAGES!! He's a freshman too. Mm...FRESH-man. I like the sound of this... What? We aren't talking about sex yet? Okay fine...alright alright, later. Should I put his name on here...okay his first name. Shane. He is very funny. Something about him, and I don't just mean the ADD. I must be attracted to people with that intense energy they claim to be a problem. They are out to get me. They want me unhappy...Grr...What am I talking about? I don't even know. There's a real dumb fuck at school...Carey. He tries to be that kind of smart/sarcastic/mean-ish funny, but he just seems like an idiot to me. An arrogant idiot. I just needed to write that. And the rage submits to temporary relief. Ahh... I should not let myself getso pissed off. NOT HEALTHY!! No sir-ee. Gotta think happy. When one's thoughts are pleasant, one is pleasant. It's all a mental thing. Now what exactly do I mean by that? Heh I'll keep ya guessing, wouldn't want any ClaritY would we? AND NOW FOR SOME SEX!!! The more I think about it, the more I want to have "a lesbian experience"...I find myself wanting to dominate preppy girls. I think it's a sadistic urge more than anything else. But when I see those superficial, hair-all-done, got-it-at-Macys bratty girls I just wanna... UH! Motherfuckin fuck. No wonder guys get so pissed at girls. All they wanna do is boink em good and leave. Like I'm wanting to do, anyone 18? I think I'll need to get a strap on... let it be know that I am just kidding about that... I do have a tongue, and two hands ; ) Today, a day that shall forever be remembered as Bulimia Day...B-Day. Heh, why? Well, that's a little to personal to write in here isn't it?

Ahh, a blog of my very own, what fun. A big thank you to Allison who was able to excede my incompetence and actually set up this wretched excuse for an easy program. ::Large phony smile:: Anyway, I will hopefully write in this every day, and if not every week. Currently I must wisk myself off to Microsoft Word to bask in a history project about Hitler. Though before I go, I must mention this: in history class today we watched the beginning scene of Saving Private Ryan. D-Day on Omaha beach, the most difficult of battles that day. Blood splattering on Tom Hanks' face as a soldier is shot before him recieved a mere "Ew" from the boy sitting behind me. As Giovani Ribci (I know that's probably spelled wrong, however I have more important things in my life than obsessing about actors) stops a bleeding neck wound he yells out that he has, the soldier he is trying to save is shot in the head. The ironic misfortune earned a sympathetic smile from myself and various snickers from around the class. My smile was quickly torn from my face at the realization that my classmates were clearly oblivious to the notion that this had all actually happened, in fact it probably had been worse. I am currently in a somewhat fragile state of mind...seeing these things was traumatic. Later, two German soldiers try to surrender. They emerge from hinding with their hands above their heads cautious and pleading in their language. Two American soldiers taunt them with "What?! I can't understand what you're saying!" and shoot them both. I begin to cry at this point. My class laughs. The savior of my sanity at this school is my history teacher. Upon the uproar of my fellow students Savior says to them, in what I've percieved as disgust, "What are you laughing about? There's nothing funny about what's going on." Silence from all who are amused by the sick destruction of human life we call war. War is quarreling amongst the leaders who then use the people they lead to die for them. I cried because it is my belief that everyone deserves the right to live. What a waste it is to just send people somewhere to get killed. That's what battle is, killing. Those in power expect it. Do you really think Bush sends troops to Iraq thinking they'll come back safe and unharmed? oh wait...it's Bush... What I mean to say is that the public doesn't have a realistic view of what war and battle are and very little appreciation for life.

My review of this film: Long, drawn out, too dramatic, Schindler's List was much much better. And may the news be spread that, upon seeing the credits, I exclaimed, "Oooh! It's a Roman Polanski film!" Not referring to it being bad... just looooonnnnnnggggggg. Have any of you seen The Ninth Gate? Good, but LONG! RRarrg! So. My vacacacation to the East. Boston! was not where I was actually staying. I said Boston because no one knows what Nonquitt is. It is a rich area. Summer houses. Very expensive, but my family was renting one of them from a "friend".... Now really. Would a friend really make another friend pay 3k a week for a house? Sure, it's a big house... in fact it's two... but REALLY! Friend indeed. Blah! It was fun though. Got me a sunburn the last day while cohoggin'. That's right, I was digging for clams, and I got a good load too. Nothing quite like it. Very fun.... I will wear sunscreen somewhere other than my face next time. BuRN! That was a little play on words there, yah. A good bt of my time was spent playing with the childrenses. Tiger Lily-19 months- and Elizabeth-3- were the two who recieved the most attention. Tiger is my first cousin, I believe. Elizabeth is my mom's cousin's daughter--what does that make her to me? Never really understood it.... oh well. GF (once Grand Fuck, now Grand Father again) has gotten nice! Like, seriously nice and loving. THE GLORY OF ANTIDEPRESSANTS!!! I sing praise... I notice that I do not describe much. GF was just really calm and reassuring and offering help. Twas great. I actually enjoyed entertaining the kids more than talking to the adults. Was fun, though I did feel like my IQ was consistently dropping the more I was around them. "Das Dutch" was one of Tiger's catch phrases...so to speak... when the week was over she had learned some new words. Like boat, No-no (she'd say that whenever she saw my mom, poor mom), Ka (car) and that's all I can remember. Seeing my 96 year old great grandfather was really cool. Him sitting on the couch with thick glasses and a sweatsuit on looking around at some of the family. I come in the first night and sit next to him, say "hi... how are you" and such. It is rather akward because sometimes when he speaks it is difficult to understand... However, that same night my mum asked how he was and he looked up at her, paused, and pronouced, "I am so well!" That made my trip. Werd. Most of the family ignores him. I hate it. I tried to talk to him at most opportunities. He's not senile, and has a lethal wit ( Boston was fun. Went for a day. Saw the Constitution... it's a ship, the oldest that is still in use. Old Iron Sides. w00t! I have decided I want to be part of a crew. Whether that crew is that of pirates has yet to be decided. Muahaha! Mm.... ship. Went on a small tour of the city because the streets are fucked and one can go no where but a circle... well a square... a figurative circle. Tour amusing... the trolly driver was great. Loud and funny. I shopped with mummy too. Faneuil Hall. I have new earrings... now if only I could get my originals out. Ha! Well, it's hot I'm tired.

Here's what I wrote after my wonderous date rape~ yes, that's what it was~ How do I feel? I wanted to save myself, so I would have something new to experience one day and hopefully feel intimate with my chosen person. But I can't wait anymore and my curiosity has led only to disappointment I can hear my heart beat though my aching chest. Regret. It is not always better to regret something you did versus something you didn't do. Though, I didn't consent, so this was not my doing. I have nothing to regret. There should only be blazing fury. Forgiveness eventually. I think acceptance has already been achieved. Not mad at self as much as mad at him. Not mad at him as much as mad at male bodily functions. The option to save myself was robbed from me and I am left wondering whether I will ever be wanted for more than mere fucking. ~~~~~~Two days later~~~~~~> Somewhat more at peace now. Inner pain resides and reigns. I want him to know how hurt I am. I do not want to blame, together we made a mistake. I suffer more for the mistake. I wish the loss could have been as I'd imagined. With a trusted friend, for more than physical sensation. I do believe such a thing can exist until much later in life. I tried not to, but I do desire romance and intimacy. I want to be more than just a doll. I want to feel loved and appreciated for so much more than my sex. I feel alone again. Am capable of more compassion toward people, but, still do not feel connected. My desire for connection has clouded judgement one too many times. I should dedicate and condemn myself to celibacy for the sake of certainty that there is no good outcome of sex. ~~~~~~~The Next Day~~~~~~> Today I am worried, more so than the previous. I fear infection. I could be carrying any number of putrescent diseases. I recieve punishment for being indecisive. Why did I let him get away without seeing my tears? The tears of further damage. Why should it hurt so much? Never knowing true intimacy, this should be considered just another "day" for me. I can't feel that way when I feel robbed. If only I could go back in time. Lord, this hurts too much! Stolen from my body was the purity I held dear. I am defiled. Soiled. Impure and unfit. I now understand how it feels. They do take a piece of you they cannot return. They don't care the way we do. All that is missed is the act. My poor body. It was not his to USE. None of our bodies are. They need to be punished for this reckless and careless behavior. Not me, or any of us. I see how homosexuality is, in a way, much purer. Females are much more pure. They harbor disease and childish minds, always nagging and begging to get what they want. It's dispicable. The world orbits the penis, whether I like it or not. I am here to gratify, but what happens if I don't? What if I do the opposite? I will find a way and seek revenge for myself and my poor dirty body. They will pay. ~~~~~zing!~~~~~> Needless to say, I went a bit kooky. I've transmogrified to "man-hating psycho bitch"...hi everybody! The revenge I've sought is subtle, but deadly.
